phrases: No matter how close we are as friends,
and no matter how often I commute to the studio to see them practice,
bottom line, I am not a member of BLAST.
As I am repeatedly reminded of that fact,
I am left with the feeling of fear rather than loneliness.
Why am I so weak?
Blinking eyes call the wind
A smile clears all the noise away
The angel in your eyes whispers
Everything begins now
Can you feel it now Can you feel it now
It is like being caught in a wave
Pulling on my heart Pulling on my heart
Breath held, arms reaching out
Baby this world is different from yesterday's
You are the only one I can see
Baby my wish on a wing
This sky is torn
By a single overflowing word
Shin, where did you forget your keys?
Ring, ring!
Wh-What?
Where is the woman?
Woman?
Good for you.
You have not brought one in.
Mind your own business.
I brought you breakfast, darling.
What the hell are you up to?
How do you expect me to eat all that, first thing in the morning?
I have cake, too.
I do not get it!
Here!
And a whole cake at that?
It is gotten cold,
so I will warm it up in the microwave, okay?
What is all this?
You still do not get it?
Boy, you are slow.
Wait, Nobu.
Where are you going?
To thank her.
Or actually, to apologize.
But it is still six in the morning!
Hachiko will still be asleep.
You are right.
She said she is working today,
so if you want to apologize, do it in the evening.
Besides, you have got work during the day too, right?
Anyway, let us eat.
Today is Sunday the 29th of July.
The weather will be pleasant across the country.
However, in the Tokyo region,
there will likely be strong winds in the evening.
Coming up after the commercial break
is fortune-telling based on blood type.
You know, I have been thinking from before...
Hachi's a really good cook.
You think so?
I think she is normal.
I will leave the leftovers,
so share it with Shin, and have Yasu come over, too.
I will tell him to drop by on his way back from work.
But do not you think it would be nicer for all of us
to go and see Hachi tonight?
We should also say hi to Misato while we are at it.
Do as you wish.
I have got work tonight,
so I will have some of this cake while I still have the chance.
But it would be a shame to cut it.
Let us take a picture of it.
Took one already.
Give it to me!
He did not respond to the alarm clock, or the noise I made.
Takumi must be really tired.
And still, he agreed to see me.
I am glad, but...
I am feeling a bit guilty.
SORRY TO BOTHER YOU DURING A BUSY TIME.
THANKS.
I WILL EMAIL YOU.
I thought that for Takumi,
I was just a convenient woman he could do it with whenever he pleased.
But as things stand,
I am the one who is taking advantage of Takumi,
as a man who will hold me whenever I feel lonely.
I do not want it.
I said I do not want it!
I told you, I only came here because you gave me too much last time!
Then you can take this as an advance payment for the next time.
Sorry, Take.
I was still asleep.
Am I late?
I figured as much, so I told you to be ready at an earlier time.
Not to worry.
I brought you a change of clothes.
Oh, thanks.
I will put them here,
so get ready while I go and get Reira checked out.
Huh?
Reira stayed here, too?
I heard you are not feeling well.
You have a cold?
No, no.
I just got carsick.
But I have never known you to have motion sickness before.
Are you worried?
Of course.
If you break down, our entire band comes to a stop.
You will because problems for everyone.
Do not forget to oil the joints.
Do not talk of me like some object!
Just a figure of speech.
Then I will drink it myself.
That day, my work involved selling milk at a supermarket.
It is a sweet and delicious milk...
- I wonder how much longer...produced in Hokkaido.
- I will be repeating days like this.
- Please give it a try.
It is a sweet and delicious milk...
- Days of no progress....produced in Hokkaido.
Huh?
My keys are not in here.
Did Misato not go out today?
NANA KOMATSU FROM SEIICHI AND HARUE MIZUKOSHI
No way!
From Mr. Mizukoshi?
What is it?!
WE GOT MARRIED
He did not hafta notify me about that.
That is so nice.
I envy them.
I want to hurry and get married, too.
His wife is so cute.
He said he knew her since they were kids.
I want a cool childhood friend, too.
I do not care if I do not find a challenging job.
If I could just cook every day for someone I love,
that would make me so happy.
But marriage is unthinkable with Takumi.
I should hurry up and put an end to this pathetic relationship
and start a real one.
But can a person like me find someone
who will love me for the rest of my life?
What if things keep going like this and I cannot find anything to live for?
Am I going to grow old and die alone?
- Huh? - We are celebrating.
They just got a contract with the record company!
We have not signed it yet, though.
Like I said, what reason do you have to hesitate?
Well...
There are a number of things.
Hachi!
I am sorry.
Your cake was delicious.
Shin.
Make me your wife.
Hey, Shin!
What are you doing?!
Unable to play the guitar or piano,
I could never become a member of BLAST...
But no one can surpass the love I feel for BLAST and their music.
And I swear to this for as long as I live.
So for a straight-up punk band like us
will do better in the long run if we take our time
and go about on our own for a while, building a fan base,
rather than suddenly going big and signing with a record company.
Why?
Sure, there are many skilled artists as good as pros
who have not signed a contract with a major label,
but if you are planning on going pro eventually anyway,
why do it in such a roundabout way?
You have an offer on the table from an industry leader.
You seem to know your music, Misato.
When it comes to going pro,
our Queen, for one, is feeling a sense of urgency,
and I had initially thought if we are going to do this anyway,
why not go big and become pro?
However, after thinking it through some more...
Come on.
You do not need to think things through that much.
I know you want to be safe and tap a bridge before you cross it,
but too much tapping will cause it to collapse.
However, in the world of the major labels,
everything's driven by sales.
Even if you come up with a hit song,
unless you follow it up with another hit,
the public will be quick to desert you.
Once you are left with the image of being a one-hit wonder,
it will be extremely difficult to make a comeback.
I see.
In other words, you are saying
it would be better to get established first
by attracting fans that will stick with you,
and then switch to a major label once you have built that foundation.
That is right.
Besides, with our current position,
we would pretty much hafta agree to a contract that favors the record company.
Do you mean money?
No, various things.
But if we build a reputation, there will be more offers to go pro,
and we would be able to choose among them
for one that provides the best conditions.
I do not care about the terms!
Let us go pro and take our chances from there!
We simply need to sell songs, right?!
That is right, that is right!
But to be honest, in your present state,
I do not believe you can write several marketable songs in a row.
Nonsense!
Sure, he can!
Like, he already has!
Think about it!
I am not a big fan of punk music,
and frankly, I have never been interested in punk music at all!
I only know the Sex Pistols
because I watched that movie, Sid and Nancy!
And even then, I was left with the feeling
that I do not really understand punk music!
Is that so?
I am sorry.
But...
I like the songs Nobu writes.
And it is not that I am favoring his music because we are friends.
I have thought so ever since I heard his music for the first time.
I was totally surprised!
I was deeply moved!
It is so cool, it gave me goose bumps.
There is no way you will not sell.
You know...
Hachi...
It is okay, I understand.
Thank you.
Do not say another word.
I am so happy I could cry.
But I also think you are capable of writing songs that will be popular.
Really?
With the original BLAST, Ren wrote most of the songs,
so I do believe the music appealed to only the hardcore fans.
But compared to Ren's music, Nobu's music is closer to pop.
With a little work, I think the music could gain support
from a wide range of listeners.
But Ren's songs are very popular with the general public.
That is because now he is writing songs to suit the Trapnest style,
as a professional.
Yeah.
You are very knowledgeable, Misato.
I am impressed.
I am impressed with Ren.
He not only creates songs to suit the band,
but the songs he does write become major hits.
But the reason Trapnest's songs are so popular
has more to do with Takumi's arrangements.
No matter what kind of song, if it falls in Takumi's hands,
he can make it fit into Trapnest's style.
You know, I have always wondered,
does not Ren mind having Takumi completely change the music he writes?
I mean, do not most bands arrange their songs together?
I would not want to be ordered to play in a certain way.
He is listening to the opinions of others, it seems.
He seems to trust his band members.
In the past, Takumi used to write the songs too,
so it was a complete one-man band.
And that led to clashes, which is why back in their amateur days,
the band members kept changing, right?
Naoki is their second drummer and Ren is their fourth guitarist.
You really know all the details.
Anyone would be uncomfortable in such a band.
Of course, Ren knew all this when he joined Trapnest, right?
Yeah.
But Ren supported Takumi's beliefs from the start.
What is this belief?
He would say, I am the only one who can create a sound
that would bring out the ultimate beauty in Reira's voice.
Oh, wow.
I just thought for a moment how cool that was.
Me too.
But did not it make you jealous,
having him talk about your girlfriend like that?
How do you know about that?
I believe there is very little data I do not know
when it comes to anything to do with local bands from my hometown.
I will stop at nothing until I know everything.
It is my belief!
Is that so?
But we split up a long time ago.
I know!
I had no idea.
Jealous?
Should I be feeling jealous?
That is a strong bond we are talking about here.
They could even be a couple.
It is Takumi we are talking about.
This is no time to be thinking how cool that sounded.
We kind of got off subject.
The issue here is not about Trapnest.
It is about the future of our band.
Oh, that is right.
I am sorry.
Geez.
You always change the subject like that
whenever it turns to you.
I feel like there is something wrong with me for not being jealous.
But we should not be making any decisions about the band
without Nana present.
That is right.
So, what time is Nana returning?
Oh, she said she would be working, so she might not make it.
No way.
Nana is not coming?
I have not seen her for days.
Well, I did see her on stage yesterday, but that is one-sided.
Hey, Hachi.
We are outta wine.
Will you go buy some?
But it is not safe alone, so take Nobu with you.
You go buy it yourself.
But I am obviously under the age limit, so they will not sell me any.
It is okay, Hachi, I will go alone.
Or rather, do not come.
That is no good.
You are borderline whether or not you look old enough.
But Hachi's looking sexier lately, so she will be okay.
Sexier?
So go.
What am I going to do?
If it is just the two of us, I do not know what I am going to say.
You know...
There is no point in me coming with you if you are going to keep such a distance.
At least walk in front of me.
I would worry if I cannot see you.
Right.
Actually, I would rather not walk in front!
I feel uneasy about someone walking behind me!
Oh, sorry... but...
Is it okay if I walk next to you?
I would rather you do that, please.
Thank you!
F-For what?
I thought you would never talk to me again.
So I am glad that you came tonight.
What are you talking about?
That is nonsense.
Of course I will talk to you.
I am sorry.
Why are you apologizing?
You have done nothing wrong.
That is not true.
The truth is, I am a really horrible woman!
What do you mean horrible?
How horrible?
But it is true.
You are idealizing me for sure, Nobu!
Otherwise, there is no way you would fall in love with me!
Are not you idealizing the creature known as woman a bit too much?
If you knew the real me, you would be disappointed.
Do not you think that maybe
she was lonely from her break up with her boyfriend?
Then, disappoint me.
I want you to.
Because I do not know what else I can do to stop loving you.
Hey, Yasu, tell me the rest of the story we were talking about earlier.
So that I can learn from you.
What about?
About Reira.
Did not you get jealous after hearing Takumi's beliefs?
Yeah, I got jealous.
Real jealous.
Really?
I was jealous of his talent,
his confidence and his reckless personality.
Reira was in love with Takumi.
Even before we started going out, for some reason,
she liked to stick around me.
I am a year older than her, so I was like an older brother to her.
Takumi has always been a womanizer, but he never approached Reira.
I guess you could say she was really important to him,
but only as his diva.
I love to sing, and would love to become a singing machine.
A machine that has no desire or feels any jealousy.
A high-performance machine that will never feel tired.
But if I throw away my emotions,
it would be impossible to sing beautifully, would not it?
Being human is exhausting.
She captured my heart.
So then, I convinced her to give up on him
and go out with me.
You convinced her.
But then when I started dating her,
I felt even stronger that I could not compete against Takumi.
Looking back, I know it was just petty jealousy.
I could not bring myself to be there for Reira
when she had issues with the band
and when she was worried about moving to Tokyo.
I could not support her when she needed me the most.
So not surprisingly, we broke up.
But could not you support her now, Yasu?
No.
I doubt she needs my support anymore.
And besides, my hands are full taking care of you guys right now.
I hafta say goodbye to Takumi.
If I cannot do that, then I must free myself from these arms.
I can say goodbye, cannot I?
I can.
It will be okay.
And this time for sure, I will be really happy.
Because in these arms is all the future I ever wanted.
That is what I believe.
Where is Hachiko?
Oh, she went to buy some stuff.
Give Me a break.
Did I just miss her again?
And after speeding to get here faster.
She will be back soon.
She might be a while.
Why?
We sent her out with Nobu.
Really?!
Way to go, Shin!
Do not come back until the morning!
I am counting on you, Nobuo!
Huh?!
But I thought Miss Hachiko has a boyfriend.
I bet 10,000 yen that they will do it.
I bet 10,000 yen that they will not.
I bet 100 yen that he will come before they even do it!
You are so cheap.
Hey, Nana.
The feelings I swore that night still remain unfaded in my heart.
Those shining dreams we had back then, please do not forget them.
I reached into the sky
But I could not reach what I wanted
They grew smaller and disappeared into the sky
Like colorful balloons
I am alone
My hand had no place to go
And gently you took it
Starless night
I will not look back at the shadow of my past
I want to feel your warmth
Tears are falling down
Even if I am unsure I will not let go
Of your hand holding mine
